title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 51.11 - Department guidelines and policy for release of information to news media
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 51.11 - Department guidelines and policy for release of information to news media

State Regulations

The objective of this policy is to provide accurate
information, and to be cooperatively responsive to requests, about department
policies, programs and other areas of public interest in an effort to keep the
public fully informed of department activities, while at the same time
providing inmates and parolees under department supervision their right to
privacy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
51.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
